clearcontrol.devices.stages

Interface StageDeviceInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, WaitingInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ECC100StageDevice, SMC100StageDevice, StageDeviceBase, StageDeviceSimulator, StageHubDevice, TSTStageDevice

    public interface StageDeviceInterface
extends NameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, WaitingInterface
    StageDeviceInterface is the interface for all motorized stages. It offers a standard interface to access different degree of freedoms (DOFs) and set their target position, request the current position, homing, resetting and more.
    Author:
    royer

      • waitToArrive

        default java.lang.Boolean waitToArrive(int pIndex,
                                       double pEpsilon,
                                       long pTimeOut,
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
        Waits for a specific DOF (index) to arrive at the destination within an epsilon distance radius. The DOF is given a certain time to arrive, if it takes longer there is a timeout.
        Parameters:
        pIndex - DOF index
        pEpsilon - epsilon (radius)
        pTimeOut - timeout
        pTimeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        true of no timeout occurred

      • waitToArrive

        default java.lang.Boolean waitToArrive(double pEpsilon,
                                       long pTimeOut,
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
        Waits for all DOFs to arrive at the destination within an epsilon distance radius. The DOFs are given a certain time (per DOF) to arrive, if it takes longer there is a timeout.
        Parameters:
        pEpsilon - epsilon (radius)
        pTimeOut - timeout
        pTimeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        true if no timeout occurred

      • getGranularityPositionVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Double> getGranularityPositionVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Returns the granularity variable for a given DOF. The granularity is the step size. If there is no step size defined, the value is zero.
        Parameters:
        pDOFIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        granularity variable

      • getEnableVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getEnableVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Returns enable variable for a given DOF's index. When enabled, a DOF is allowed to move when the target position is changed.
        Parameters:
        pDOFIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        enable variable

        Returns:
        current position variable

      • getReadyVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getReadyVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Returns the ready variable for a given DOF's index. The 'ready' variable informs on whether the stage is ready to accept new commands, either a new target position or a homing command.
        Parameters:
        pDOFIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        ready variable

      • getHomingVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getHomingVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Returns the homing variable for a given DOF's index. When this variable receives an edge from false to true, the homing procedure for this DOF is started. The 'ready' variable must be checked since the stage will not respond to commands unless it is ready.
        Parameters:
        pDOFIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        homing variable

      • getStopVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getStopVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Returns the stop variable for a given DOF's index. Stops all movement on the stage's DOF.
        Parameters:
        pDOFIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        stop variable

      • getResetVariable

        Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getResetVariable(int pIndex)
        Returns the reset variable for a given DOF's index. Resets the controller into the a state equivalent to the power-on state (as if the DOFs controller had been power cycled.)
        Parameters:
        pIndex -
        Returns:
        reset variable
